content:
All of a sudden getting: The code "1659929" is not valid in the system http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm; The code provided (http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm#1659929) is not valid in the value set 'All codes known to the system' (from http://tx.fhir.org/r4) for 'http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm#1659929'

I haven't changed anything and this wasn't erroring a couple of hours ago. @Rob Hausam

Sorry about that, @Sarah Gaunt. I updated RxNorm to the 08022021 version last night. It turned out that was a 6 hour process, and I just verified that it completed successfully when I got up this morning. I'm able to $validate-code and $lookup the '1659929' code this morning, so I assume you must have run into a temporary issue with it during the import. :( Check it out again now and see if it's working for you.
